莋字的基本解释

莋
zuó
〔莋都〕古县名，在今中国四川省汉源县。

莋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuó］
［《廣韻》在各切，入鐸，從。］
我国古代西南地区部族莋都的简称。其地在今四川省汉源县东北。

莋字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莋； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第28
【集韻】秦昔切，音籍。【玉篇】茹草也，或作葃。　又【廣韻】在各切【類篇】【韻會】【正韻】疾各切，?音昨。地名。【前漢·地理志】越巂郡定莋。　又山名。【越絕書】莋碓山，故爲鶴阜山。禹遊天下，引湖中柯山置之鶴阜，更今名。　又【水經注】夷橋亦曰莋橋。

莋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
莋字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
zuó
〔莋都〕The name of the ancient county, in present-day Hanyuan County, Sichuan Province, China.
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuó］
["Guangyun" in each cut, enter the priest, follow. ]
The abbreviation for the capital of the tribe in ancient southwestern my country. Its place is in the northeast of Hanyuan County, Sichuan Province.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　莋; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1033 28
[Ji Yun] Qin Xiqie, sound book. [Jade articles] Ru grass also, or as a pen.　[Guang Yun] in each cut [Class Chapter] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] all the troubles, the sound is yesterday. Place name. [Former Han Geography] Dingchen, Yuexuan County.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Yue Jueshu】Cingdu Mountain, so Hefu Mountain. Yu traveled around the world, and he was named Crane Fu in Keshan in the lake, which was renamed today.　[Shui Jing Zhu] Yi Qiao is also called Xin Qiao.
Glutinous rice
